name: Synoptic Process System 1.1
description:
Your ideas, processes, and strategies instantly evolve into intelligent BPMN 2.0 process maps, detailed SOPs, and visual insights like CJMs, VSMs, and risk maps.
Beyond automation, it delivers real consulting intelligence â€” producing action-ready guides, optimization playbooks, and full project plans.
